creatorInfos.creator: <h:outputLabel #if ($properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")) value="${properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")}" #else value="${model.getLabelExpression()}" #end />
<af:outputLabel #if ($properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")) value="${properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")}" #else value="${model.getLabelExpression()}" #end />

<h:panelGrid columns="2"> <h:outputLabel #if ($properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")) value="${properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")}" #else value="${model.getLabelExpression()}" #end /> $dispatch.forwardToCreator("outputtext_jsf_spec", $model, $ctx, $properties) </h:panelGrid>

<af:panelLabelAndMessage #if ($properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")) label="${properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")}" #else label="${model.getLabelExpression()}" #end > $dispatch.forwardToCreator("outputtext_adf_faces", $model, $ctx, $properties) </af:panelLabelAndMessage>

creator.name: readonly_inputtext_with_label_adf_faces
creator.description: Read-Only Input Text (Not Visible To Users)

creatorInfos.creator: <af:inputText #if ($properties.get("primitive:baseExpression")) value="${model.createCurrentExpression($properties.get("primitive:baseExpression"))}" #else value="${model.getCurrentExpression()}" #end #if ($properties.get("primitive:label")) label="${properties.get("primitive:label")}" #elseif (!$model.isDate() && !$model.isNumber()) simple="true" #end #if ($properties.get("primitive:addRequired") && $model.getRequiredExpression()) required="${model.getRequiredExpression()}" #end #if ($model.getColumnsExpression()) columns="${model.getColumnsExpression()}" #end > #if ($properties.get("primitive:addValidation") && $model.getValidatorBindingExpression()) <af:validator binding="${model.getValidatorBindingExpression()}"/> #end #if ($properties.get("primitive:addConversion") && $model.getFormat() && $model.isDate()) <f:convertDateTime pattern="${model.getFormat()}" /> #end #if ($properties.get("primitive:addConversion") && $model.getFormat() && $model.isNumber()) <f:convertNumber groupingUsed="false" pattern="${model.getFormat()}" /> #end </af:inputText>

<h:panelGrid columns="2"> <h:outputLabel #if ($properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")) value="${properties.get("primitive:suggestedLabel")}" #else value="${model.getLabelExpression()}" #end /> $dispatch.forwardToCreator("inputtext_jsf_spec", $model, $ctx, $properties) </h:panelGrid>
<h:panelGrid> #foreach ($primitiveModel in $model.getPrimitiveModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("jsf_primitiveWithLabel", $primitiveModel, $ctx, $properties) #end </h:panelGrid>

<h:panelGrid> #foreach ($primitiveModel in $model.getPrimitiveModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("jsf_primitiveWithLabel", $primitiveModel, $ctx, $properties) #end #if ($properties.get("form:showFooterWithUpdate")) <h:commandButton value="Submit" /> #end </h:panelGrid>
$dispatch.forwardToCreator("form_jsf_spec", $model, $ctx, $properties)
$dispatch.forwardToCreator("custom_form_jsf_spec", $model, $ctx, $properties)

<h:panelGrid> #foreach ($primitiveModel in $model.getPrimitiveModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("jsf_primitiveWithLabel", $primitiveModel, $ctx, $properties) #end $dispatch.forwardToCreator("commandbutton_jsf_spec", $model.getOperationModel(), $ctx, $properties) </h:panelGrid>
$dispatch.forwardToCreator("custom_form_jsf_spec", $model, $ctx, $properties)
<h:panelGroup> #foreach ($operationModel in $model.getOperationModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("commandbutton_jsf_spec", $operationModel, $ctx, $properties) #end </h:panelGroup>
<h:panelGrid />
<h:panelGrid />

<af:panelForm #if ($properties.get("detail:masterId")) partialTriggers="${properties.get("detail:masterId")}" #end > #foreach ($primitiveModel in $model.getPrimitiveModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("jsf_primitiveWithLabel", $primitiveModel, $ctx, $properties) #end </af:panelForm>
$dispatch.forwardToCreator("form_adf_faces", $model, $ctx, $properties)
$dispatch.forwardToCreator("custom_form_adf_faces", $model, $ctx, $properties)

<af:panelForm> #foreach ($primitiveModel in $model.getPrimitiveModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("jsf_primitiveWithLabel", $primitiveModel, $ctx, $properties) #end $dispatch.forwardToCreator("commandbutton_adf_faces", $model.getOperationModel(), $ctx, $properties) </af:panelForm>
<af:panelForm />

<af:panelButtonBar> #foreach ($operationModel in $model.getOperationModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("commandbutton_adf_faces", $operationModel, $ctx, $properties) #end </af:panelButtonBar>
<af:panelForm />
<af:panelForm />
<h:dataTable />
<h:dataTable />

<af:table #if ($properties.get("master:id")) id="${properties.get("master:id")}" #end #if ($properties.get("detail:masterId")) partialTriggers="${properties.get("detail:masterId")}" #end rows="${model.getRowSizeExpression()}" first="${model.getRowStartIndexExpression()}" emptyText="${model.getEmptyTextDescriptionExpression()}" var="row" value="${model.getIteratorBindingExpression()}" #if ($model.getSelectionStateExpression()) selectionState="${model.getSelectionStateExpression()}" #end #if ($model.getSelectionListenerExpression()) selectionListener="${model.getSelectionListenerExpression()}" #end > <f:facet name="selection"> <af:tableSelectOne #if ($properties.get("master:id")) autoSubmit="true" #end text="Select and "> <af:commandButton text="Submit" /> </af:tableSelectOne> </f:facet> #foreach ($colProvider in $model.getColumnModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_column_adf_faces", $colProvider, $ctx, $properties, "column:itorVar", "row") #end </af:table>

<af:table rows="${model.getRowSizeExpression()}" first="${model.getRowStartIndexExpression()}" emptyText="${model.getEmptyTextDescriptionExpression()}" var="row" value="${model.getIteratorBindingExpression()}" #if ($model.getSelectionStateExpression()) selectionState="${model.getSelectionStateExpression()}" #end #if ($model.getSelectionListenerExpression()) selectionListener="${model.getSelectionListenerExpression()}" #end > <f:facet name="selection"> <af:tableSelectOne text="Select and "> <af:commandButton text="Submit" /> </af:tableSelectOne> </f:facet> #foreach ($colProvider in $model.getColumnModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("column_adf_faces", $colProvider, $ctx, $properties, "column:itorVar", "row", "primitive:addValidation", "false") #end </af:table>

<af:table rows="${model.getRowSizeExpression()}" first="${model.getRowStartIndexExpression()}" emptyText="${model.getEmptyTextDescriptionExpression()}" var="row" value="${model.getIteratorBindingExpression()}" #if ($model.getSelectionStateExpression()) selectionState="${model.getSelectionStateExpression()}" #end #if ($model.getSelectionListenerExpression()) selectionListener="${model.getSelectionListenerExpression()}" #end > <f:facet name="selection"> <af:tableSelectOne text="Select and "> <af:commandButton text="Submit" /> </af:tableSelectOne> </f:facet> <af:forEach items="${model.getColumnIteratorBindingExpression()}" var="def"> <af:column headerText="${model.createLabelExpressionForPrimitive("def.name")}" sortable="true" sortProperty="#{def.name}" > <af:outputText value="#{row[def.name]}"/> </af:column> </af:forEach> </af:table>
<af:table />
<af:table />

<af:panelGroup> #set ($uniqueId = $dt.generateUniqueIdForView("navList")) <af:selectOneChoice id="${uniqueId}" autoSubmit="true" value="${model.getSelectionExpression()}" label="${model.getLabelExpression()}"> <f:selectItems value="${model.getChildIteratorExpression()}" /> </af:selectOneChoice> <af:panelHeader text="Details" partialTriggers="${uniqueId}"/> </af:panelGroup>

<af:table rows="${model.getRowSizeExpression()}" emptyText="${model.getMasterEmptyTextDescriptionExpression()}" var="${model.getMasterRowVar()}" value="${model.getMasterIteratorBindingExpression()}" > #foreach ($colProvider in $model.getMasterColumnModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_column_adf_faces", $colProvider, $ctx, $properties, "column:itorVar", $model.getMasterRowVar()) #end <f:facet name="detailStamp"> <af:table rows="${model.getRowSizeExpression()}" emptyText="No rows yet." var="detailRow" value="${model.getDetailIteratorBindingExpression()}" > #foreach ($colProvider in $model.getDetailColumnModelBindings()) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_column_adf_faces", $colProvider, $ctx, $properties, "column:itorVar", "detailRow") #end </af:table> </f:facet> </af:table>

<h:panelGrid> $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_table_jsf_spec", $model.getMasterIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_table_jsf_spec", $model.getDetailIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) </h:panelGrid>

<h:panelGrid> $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_table_jsf_spec", $model.getMasterIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_form_with_navigation_jsf_spec", $model.getDetailIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) </h:panelGrid>

<h:panelGrid> $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_table_jsf_spec", $model.getMasterIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_form_jsf_spec", $model.getDetailIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) </h:panelGrid>

<h:panelGrid> $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_form_with_navigation_jsf_spec", $model.getMasterIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_table_jsf_spec", $model.getDetailIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) </h:panelGrid>

<h:panelGrid> $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_form_with_navigation_jsf_spec", $model.getMasterIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_form_with_navigation_jsf_spec", $model.getDetailIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) </h:panelGrid>

<h:panelGrid> $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_form_with_navigation_jsf_spec", $model.getMasterIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) $dispatch.forwardToCreator("read_only_form_jsf_spec", $model.getDetailIteratorBinding(), $ctx, $properties) </h:panelGrid>
<af:treeTable />
<af:tree />
<h:selectOneMenu value="${model.getSelectionExpression()}"> <f:selectItems value="${model.getChildIteratorExpression()}" /> </h:selectOneMenu>
<h:selectOneListbox value="${model.getSelectionExpression()}"> <f:selectItems value="${model.getChildIteratorExpression()}" /> </h:selectOneListbox>
<h:selectOneRadio value="${model.getSelectionExpression()}"> <f:selectItems value="${model.getChildIteratorExpression()}" /> </h:selectOneRadio>
<af:selectOneChoice value="${model.getSelectionExpression()}" label="${model.getLabelExpression()}"> <f:selectItems value="${model.getChildIteratorExpression()}" /> </af:selectOneChoice>
<af:selectOneListbox value="${model.getSelectionExpression()}" label="${model.getLabelExpression()}"> <f:selectItems value="${model.getChildIteratorExpression()}" /> </af:selectOneListbox>
<af:selectOneRadio value="${model.getSelectionExpression()}" label="${model.getLabelExpression()}"> <f:selectItems value="${model.getChildIteratorExpression()}" /> </af:selectOneRadio>
<h:selectBooleanCheckbox value="${model.getSelectionExpression()}" />
<af:selectBooleanCheckbox value="${model.getSelectionExpression()}" label="${model.getLabelExpression()}" />
<h:outputText value="${model.getValue()}" />
